result.name: utopia-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Utopia rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015):

Cruise: utpa_svgl0412

Date: 28th February - 29th February 2012

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 20 video transects; 233 stills analysed - 
Usable

PSA Samples to date: None acquired to date

Infauna Samples to date: None acquired to date
